/* 회원 정보 수정 */ UPDATE ingredient_registration
member_id = #{memberId},
ingredient_category_code = #{ingredientCategoryCode},
ingredient_name = #{ingredientName},
update_time = NOW(),
delete_time = #{deleteTime},
WHERE ingredient_code = #{ingredientCode};
